Description: Textile; narrow cream wool band or ribbon with green and red stripes and two attached green tassels; tassels are a bundle of threads tied by a cord; the cord threads threaded through selvedge before twisting. Warp: Z-spun wool, 32 ends in 1.2cm Weft: Z-spun wool, ca 7 picks/cm Edges: two selvedges, others cut
Curator's comments: History of use: use uncertain. Z-spinning points to comparatively late date. H. Granger-Taylor, 19/09/1989
Condition: Poor - conservation (unknown date): stuck to a sticky net.
